import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import API from '../api/api' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Home.css' import Footer from './pages/Footer' function Home() { const [books, setBooks] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { API.get('/books').then(res => setBooks(res.data)) }, []) return (

Discover Your Next Favorite Book

Read reviews. Share thoughts. Connect through stories.

Browse All Books

Featured Books

{books.slice(0, 4).map(book => (
{book.title}

{book.author}

View
))}
) } export default Home
